profile_positions.description:
SECAN Aerospace, HONEYWELL Group, Vapor Cycle System Dpt, France.
- Project management, design and validation of 2 test benches for EMBRAER 145 radar vapor cycle cooling system (VCS) & TBM 700 (SOCATA) cabin VCS & preliminary study for SUPER LYNX 300 (WESTLAND) VCS test bench.
- Qualification tests and validation of aircraft air-cooling systems, FAIs
- Test of units coming back for repair/maintenance
- Documentation preparation for RFP for Eurocopter (Safran Helicopter) NH90 RAGB (Remote Accessories Gear Box) cooling system (compliance matrices, development plan, management plan, quality plan, technical proposal)
- And also : Specification writing (frame, software, instrumentation), Suppliers management, Final quality checks, Customer contacts, Management of contractors & workshop staff, components orders.
(Under Segime / Altran contract)
